channel.title: Ricrecs on RIRSC
channel.description: Recent content in Ricrecs on RIRSC

item.title: 24week22 - Trholz zine and dep Albini
item.description:
After seeing Trholz↗ at idvogh, I bought them one fanzine. Cool drawings and it has the lyrics&tabs of the songs; win-win.


I have been playing the latest album from Shellac, To All Trains (snif, DEP Steve Albini) in order to keep his memory a bit more recent in my brain these days. Im also thinking on re-doing again his famous ‘Fluffy’↗ coffe.

This is an authentic gem: A curated collection of HCI demo videos produced during the golden age from 1983-2002.↗

Re-watching Serial Experiments Lain, because its so on point with how we communicate online and all the It doesnt matter when you read this.

My favorite thing is Monsters II is finally out. Time for a visit to the store :)

Lately I was digging back into math rock, so this session Math rock NTS session↗ by the one and only Loraine James comes just perfect.

TTRPGs for Palestine.↗ Cute. I think I dont know even one, wow.

I bought the volumen II from Web Wide World↗ , and I read it while listening to his OST. Go check John Powell-Jones↗ art.

Interesting marginalia.nu↗ .

Finished Animal Well; now the fun starts.
